description: Update the physical and logistical details for a rack at a site. For more information about hardware requirements for racks, see Network readiness checklist in the Amazon Web Services Outposts User Guide. To update a rack at a site with an order of IN_PROGRESS, you must wait for the order to complete or cancel the order.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The ID or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the site.

parameters.name: PowerPhase
parameters.description: The power option that you can provide for hardware. Single-phase AC feed: 200 V to 277 V, 50 Hz or 60 Hz Three-phase AC feed: 346 V to 480 V, 50 Hz or 60 Hz.

parameters.name: PowerConnector
parameters.description: The power connector that Amazon Web Services should plan to provide for connections to the hardware. Note the correlation between PowerPhase and PowerConnector. Single-phase AC feed L6-30P --- (common in US); 30A; single phase IEC309 (blue) --- P+N+E, 6hr; 32 A; single phase Three-phase AC feed AH530P7W (red) --- 3P+N+E, 7hr; 30A; three phase AH532P6W (red) --- 3P+N+E, 6hr; 32A; three phase CS8365C --- (common in US); 3P+E, 50A; three phase.

parameters.name: UplinkCount
parameters.description: Racks come with two Outpost network devices. Depending on the supported uplink speed at the site, the Outpost network devices provide a variable number of uplinks. Specify the number of uplinks for each Outpost network device that you intend to use to connect the rack to your network. Note the correlation between UplinkGbps and UplinkCount. 1Gbps - Uplinks available: 1, 2, 4, 6, 8 10Gbps - Uplinks available: 1, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16 40 and 100 Gbps- Uplinks available: 1, 2, 4

parameters.name: OpticalStandard
parameters.description: The type of optical standard that you will use to attach the Outpost to your network. This field is dependent on uplink speed, fiber type, and distance to the upstream device. For more information about networking requirements for racks, see Network in the Amazon Web Services Outposts User Guide. OPTIC_10GBASE_SR: 10GBASE-SR OPTIC_10GBASE_IR: 10GBASE-IR OPTIC_10GBASE_LR: 10GBASE-LR OPTIC_40GBASE_SR: 40GBASE-SR OPTIC_40GBASE_ESR: 40GBASE-ESR OPTIC_40GBASE_IR4_LR4L: 40GBASE-IR (LR4L) OPTIC_40GBASE_LR4: 40GBASE-LR4 OPTIC_100GBASE_SR4: 100GBASE-SR4 OPTIC_100GBASE_CWDM4: 100GBASE-CWDM4 OPTIC_100GBASE_LR4: 100GBASE-LR4 OPTIC_100G_PSM4_MSA: 100G PSM4 MSA OPTIC_1000BASE_LX: 1000Base-LX OPTIC_1000BASE_SX : 1000Base-SX.

nested_items.name: SiteId
nested_items.description: The ID of the site.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the site.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the site.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SiteArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the site.

nested_items.name: Notes
nested_items.description: Notes about a site.

nested_items.name: OperatingAddressCountryCode
nested_items.description: The ISO-3166 two-letter country code where the hardware is installed and powered on.

nested_items.name: OperatingAddressStateOrRegion
nested_items.description: State or region where the hardware is installed and powered on.

nested_items.name: OperatingAddressCity
nested_items.description: City where the hardware is installed and powered on.

nested_items.name: RackPhysicalProperties
nested_items.description: Information about the physical and logistical details for a rack at the site.

nested_items.name: PowerDrawKva
nested_items.description: The power draw available at the hardware placement position for the rack.

nested_items.name: PowerPhase
nested_items.description: The power option that you can provide for hardware.

nested_items.name: PowerConnector
nested_items.description: The power connector for the hardware.

nested_items.name: PowerFeedDrop
nested_items.description: The position of the power feed.

nested_items.name: UplinkGbps
nested_items.description: The uplink speed the rack supports for the connection to the Region.

nested_items.name: UplinkCount
nested_items.description: The number of uplinks each Outpost network device.

nested_items.name: FiberOpticCableType
nested_items.description: The type of fiber used to attach the Outpost to the network.

nested_items.name: OpticalStandard
nested_items.description: The type of optical standard used to attach the Outpost to the network. This field is dependent on uplink speed, fiber type, and distance to the upstream device. For more information about networking requirements for racks, see Network in the Amazon Web Services Outposts User Guide.

nested_items.name: MaximumSupportedWeightLbs
nested_items.description: The maximum rack weight that this site can support. NO_LIMIT is over 2000 lbs (907 kg).
